title: I didnt get my ip booster
body: I verified my email, on site there was informarmation that I have to wait 48 hours for my reward.Its been 3 days and I still dont have boosters. Will I get them?

replies.body: They might not be applying currently.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our account team can see if they might be able to manually add it for you, if you haven't already received one before.  See you there!
